analyzed: ston pas de la bka' stsal pa // mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yi //
translated: The Teacher replied to him:🔽“I will teach just a fraction

analyzed: dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan //

analyzed: mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni //
translated: By circumambulating a stūpa,

original: 'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs //
translated: One will become a tathāgata in the world,🔽Adorned with the major marks,

original: mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: And attain a golden-colored body.

original: lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin //
analyzed: lus kyi las kyang bskor ba yin //
translated: The physical actions are also circumambulation,

original: ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin //
analyzed: ngag gi las kyang bskor ba yin //
translated: The verbal actions are also circumambulation,

original: yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin //
analyzed: yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin //
translated: And the mental actions are also circumambulation.

original: smon lam btab pa'ang bskor ba yin //
analyzed: smon lam btab pa'ang bskor ba yin //
translated: And the merit of making prostrations and circumambulations.

original: 'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis //
analyzed: 'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis //
translated: Here, by making circumambulations,

original: bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub //🔽'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la //
analyzed: bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub // 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la //
translated: One accomplishes the nine goals that are difficult to attain.🔽What are the qualities of circumambulating

original: bskor ba byas pa'i yon tan gang //🔽de ni tshig tsam nyi tshe yis //
analyzed: bskor ba byas pa'i yon tan gang // de ni tshig tsam nyi tshe yis //
translated: The stūpa of the Lord of the World?🔽That cannot be fully taught

original: legs par bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: legs par bstan par mi nus so //
translated: By mere words.

original: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
translated: Out of compassion for sentient beings,

original: sh'a ri'i bus ni zhus nas kyang //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus ni zhus nas kyang //
translated: Śāriputra made a request,🔽And the Lord of the World taught

original: mchod rten phyag byas yon tan gang /🔽'jig rten mgon pos bstan pa yin //🔽rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya //
analyzed: mchod rten phyag byas yon tan gang / 'jig rten mgon pos bstan pa yin // rta brgya dang ni gser srang brgya //
translated: The qualities of prostrating to the stūpa.🔽One hundred horses, one hundred measures of gold,🔽One hundred mule-drawn chariots,

original: drel mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang // rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams //
analyzed: drel mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang // rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams //
translated: And one hundred mare-drawn chariots

original: rin chen sna tshogs bkang ba yang //🔽bskor ba'i gom pa gcig por ba'i //
analyzed: rin chen sna tshogs bkang ba yang // bskor ba'i gom pa gcig por ba'i //
translated: Filled with various jewels

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
translated: Do not equal even a sixteenth🔽Of the merit of one step of circumambulation.

original: kam po dzi yi bu mo brgya //
analyzed: kam po dzi yi bu mo brgya //
translated: One hundred daughters of the king of Kāmboja,

original: nor bu rna cha gdub 'khor thogs //
analyzed: nor bu rna cha gdub 'khor thogs //
translated: Wearing jeweled earrings and anklets,

original: gser @308a *// gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang // mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa //
analyzed: gser @308a *// gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang // mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa //
translated: their necks well-adorned with gold,

original: bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i //
analyzed: bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i //
translated: even a single step of circumambulation

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
translated: is worth sixteen of them.

original: gangs kyi glang chen brgya snyed dag /
analyzed: gangs kyi glang chen brgya snyed dag /
translated: Hundreds of snow elephants,🔽with large bodies and wide trunks,

original: lus chen nam tshod yangs pa dang // sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang //
analyzed: lus chen nam tshod yangs pa dang // sna yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang //
translated: elephants with trunks like plow handles,🔽adorned with gold and jewels,

original: gser dang nor bus brgyan pa dang // bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i //
analyzed: gser dang nor bus brgyan pa dang // bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i //
translated: even a single step of circumambulation

original: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //🔽mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
analyzed: bcu drug char yang mi phod do // mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
translated: is worth sixteen of them.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: dga' ba'i sems gyis gom pa gcig bor ba //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems gyis gom pa gcig bor ba //
translated: takes a single step to a Buddha stūpa,

original: dzambu'i chu klung gser srang 'bum grangs snyed //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu klung gser srang 'bum grangs snyed //
translated: even a hundred thousand measures of gold from the Jambū River

original: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //🔽mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
analyzed: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin // mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
translated: is not equal to that.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis 'jim gong gcig bor ba //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis 'jim gong gcig bor ba //
translated: places a single lump of clay on a Buddha stūpa,

original: dzambu'i chu klung gser gyi pho brang 'bum //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu klung gser gyi pho brang 'bum //
translated: even a hundred thousand golden palaces of the Jambū River

original: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //🔽mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
analyzed: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin // mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
translated: There is nothing that is equal to that.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spungs //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spungs //
translated: offers a handful of flowers to a stūpa of the Buddha,

original: dzambu'i chu klung gser snod 'bum bzhag pa //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu klung gser snod 'bum bzhag pa //
translated: is superior to someone who offers a hundred thousand containers of gold from the Jambū River.

original: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //🔽mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
analyzed: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin // mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
translated: There is nothing that is equal to that.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba thogs //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba thogs //
translated: offers a garland of flowers to a stūpa of the Buddha,

original: dzambu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis //
translated: is superior to someone who offers two hundred thousand loads of gold from the Jambū River.

original: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //🔽mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
analyzed: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin // mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
translated: There is nothing that is equal to that.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: dga' ba'i @308b sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: dga' ba'i @308b sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba //
translated: offers perfumed water to a stūpa of the Buddha,

original: dzambu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum //
translated: is superior to someone who offers a hundred thousand heaps of gold from the Jambū River.

original: de na de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //🔽mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
analyzed: de na de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin // mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la //
translated: There is nothing that is equal to that.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul byed pa //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul byed pa //
translated: offers a lamp to a stūpa of the Buddha,

original: dzambu'i chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum //
analyzed: dzambu'i chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum //
translated: is superior to someone who offers a hundred thousand ten-millions of gold coins from the Jambū River.

original: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //
translated: There is nothing that is comparable to that.🔽The wise one who, with a joyful mind,

original: mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la; ;dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs //
analyzed: mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la; ;dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs //
translated: erects a victory banner, a canopy, or a flag over a stūpa of the Buddha,

original: gser gyi ri bo lhun po tshad 'bum yang //
analyzed: gser gyi ri bo lhun po tshad 'bum yang //
translated: even if it is as high as Mount Meru,

original: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin //
translated: there is nothing that is comparable to that.

original: 'di ni dpag med de bzhin gshegs;/
analyzed: 'di ni dpag med de bzhin gshegs;/
translated: This is immeasurable, just like the Tathāgata,

original: rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //🔽ded dpon bla na med pa la //
analyzed: rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas // ded dpon bla na med pa la //
translated: the perfect Buddha, who is like the ocean.🔽I have explained the benefits

original: phul ba'i phan yon bstan pa yin //
analyzed: phul ba'i phan yon bstan pa yin //
translated: of offering to the unsurpassed captain.

original: bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis mchod //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis mchod //
translated: If someone makes offerings while the Buddha is alive,

original: mya ngan 'das 'og gang gis mchod //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das 'og gang gis mchod //
translated: and if someone makes offerings after the Buddha has passed into nirvāṇa,

original: sems dge ba ni mtshungs 'gyur na //
analyzed: sems dge ba ni mtshungs 'gyur na //
translated: if the mind is virtuous,

original: bsod nams la ni khyad par med //
analyzed: bsod nams la ni khyad par med //
translated: there is no difference in merit.

original: de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
translated: Thus, the Buddha is inconceivable,

original: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
translated: the Buddha’s Dharma is also inconceivable.

original: bsam mi khyab la dang rnams kyis //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab la dang rnams kyis //
translated: For those with inconceivable faith,

original: rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
translated: the ripening is also inconceivable.

original: mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The verses on circumambulating the stūpa are complete.
